name: CheckDomainAvailabilityBulk
description:
Check availability for multiple domains.

Use this tool to check if multiple domains are available for purchase. This can help in planning before acquiring domains via the buying endpoints.

parameters.name: domain_names
parameters.description: A list of domain names to check, with a maximum of 50 domains.

value_schema.description: an array of at most 50 item(s)

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the team or organization associated with the request. It may be required to access specific domain availability data.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: domains
parameters.description: an array of at most 50 item(s)

value_schema.description: an array of at most 50 item(s)
